Source.Name: koffice
Source.Summary: An integrated office suite for KDE
Source.Description: KOffice is a free, integrated office suite for KDE. The application suite consists of a word-processor, a spreadsheet application, a presentation creator and viewer application, an organizer and more.

Package.Name: koffice-kthesaurus
Package.Summary: Thesaurus for the KDE Office Suite

Package.Name: koffice-kpresenter
Package.Summary: Presentation program for the KDE Office Suite

Package.Name: koffice-kexi
Package.Summary: KOffice integrated environment for database management

Package.Name: kexi-plugin-kspread
Package.Summary: This package is part of the KDE Office Suite and provides Kspread plugin for Kexi

Package.Name: kexi-plugin-mysql
Package.Summary: This package is part of the KDE Office Suite and provides MySQL plugin for Kexi

Package.Name: kexi-plugin-postgresql
Package.Summary: This package is part of the KDE Office Suite and provides PostgreSQL plugin for Kexi
